node.text: *gentle snarl* Greetings, =pronouns.formalAddressTerm=. How do you fare?
node.choice: I am well. Please, tell me about yourself.

node.text: They call me King, though I am no royalty. This village offered hospitality and kindness when I needed it most, so I'm currently offering them my services as appreciation.
node.choice: A pleasure to meet you, King. What led you to Joppa?
I wanted to discuss something else.

node.text: My closest friend and I were hired to escort a caravan through the nearby canyons to Kyakukya. We'd just passed Red Rock when we were accosted by a pair of bipedal bears. The encounter was hectic, to say the least, and I ended up wounded and separated from the rest of the group. Next thing I know, I'm being tended to here in Joppa. I'm not sure what happened to my friend or the caravan.
node.choice: I wanted to discuss something else.

node.text: Why, that would be immensely appreciated. If you're certain, you'll find where we were attacked 3 parasangs east of Red Rock. If you can find a sign that anyone survived, bring it back here. Please, be careful.
node.choice: Apologies, King. I'll have to help you another time.
